resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103651</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103651</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206631</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Our Shared History: African American Heritage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unsere Geteilte Geschichte: Afrikanisches 
Amerikanisches Erbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notre Histoire Partagée : Héritage 
Américain Africain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nosso History Compartilhado: Heritage 
Americano Africano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Nostra Storia Comune: Eredità Americana 
Africana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κοινή ιστορία μας: Αφρικανική αμερικανική 
κληρονομιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuestra Historia Compartida: Herencia 
Americana Africana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells about the Underground Railroad, African Americans in the Civil War, historic places of the civil rights movement, the Delta blues of the Lower Mississippi Valley, and landmarks dedicated to Booker T. Washington, Martin Luther King, and Frederick Douglass.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt über die unterirdische Eisenbahn, die 
afrikanischen Amerikaner im Bürgerkrieg, die historischen Orte der 
Zivilrechtbewegung, das Dreiecksblau der untereren Mississippi Senke 
und die Grenzsteine, die Booker T. Washington, Martin Luther König 
und Frederick Douglass eingesetzt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit au sujet du chemin de fer souterrain, des 
Américains africains dans la guerre civile, des endroits historiques 
du mouvement de droits civiques, des bleus de delta de la vallée 
inférieure du Mississippi, et des bornes limites consacrées à 
Booker T. Washington, à roi de Martin Luther, et à Frederick 
Douglass.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz sobre a estrada de ferro subterrânea, os 
americanos africanos na guerra civil, os lugares historic do movimento
das direitas civis, os azuis do delta do vale mais baixo de 
Mississippi, e os marcos dedicados a Booker T. Washington, a rei de 
Martin Luther, e a Frederick Douglass.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice a circa la ferrovia sotterranea, gli 
Americani africani nella guerra civile, i posti storici del movimento 
di diritti civili, gli azzurri di delta della valle più bassa del 
Mississippi ed i limiti dedicati a Booker il T. Washington, al re del 
Martin Luther ed a Frederick Douglass.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει για τον υπόγειο σιδηρόδρομο, αφρικανικοί 
Αμερικανοί στον εμφύλιο πόλεμο, τις ιστορικές θέσεις της 
μετακίνησης αστικών δικαιωμάτων, τα του δέλτα μπλε της 
χαμηλότερης κοιλάδας του Μισισιπή, και τα ορόσημα που 
αφιερώνονται Booker Τ. Ουάσιγκτον, Martin Luther King, 
και Frederick Douglass.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habla del ferrocarril subterráneo, de los 
americanos africanos en la guerra civil, de los lugares históricos 
del movimiento de las derechas civiles, de los azul del delta del 
valle más bajo de Mississippi, y de las señales dedicadas a Booker 
T. Washington, al rey de Martin Luther, y a Frederick Douglass.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206631</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103651</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/our-shared-history-african-american-heritage</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
